byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: A group of students stormed into Goldman Sachs's offices in Milan on Friday, as protests against the financial industry spread around the world, according to Reuters.
snippet: A group of students stormed into Goldman Sachs's offices in Milan on Friday, as protests against the financial industry spread around the world, according to Reuters.
lead_paragraph: A group of students stormed into Goldman Sachs's offices in Milan on Friday, as protests against the financial industry spread around the world, according to Reuters. The protesters were dispelled, but not before spray-painting "Give us money" on the building's walls. Read more »

headline.main: A Milanese Run on the Bank
